CertificateName.Description: The name of the certificate to be created.

IdentityServerCertificateName.Description: The name of the certificate to be created for the identity server.

IdentityServerSiteName.Description: The name of the identity server to be created.

LicenseFile.Description: The path to the Sitecore license file.

Prefix.Description: The prefix for uniquely identifying instances.

XP1CollectionPackage.Description: The path to the XP1 Collection package to deploy.

XP1CollectionSearchPackage.Description: The path to the XP1 Collection search package to deploy.

XP1MarketingAutomationPackage.Description: The path to the XP1 Marketing Automation package to deploy.

XP1MarketingAutomationReportingPackage.Description: The path to the XP1 Marketing Automation Reporting package to deploy.

XP1ReferenceDataPackage.Description: The path to the XP1 reference data package to deploy.

SitecoreXP1CDPackage.Description: The path to the Sitecore XP1 content delivery package to deploy.

SitecoreXP1CMPackage.Description: The path to the Sitecore XP1 content management package to deploy.

SitecoreXP1RepPackage.Description: The path to the Sitecore XP1 rep package to deploy.

SitecoreXP1PrcPackage.Description: The path to the Sitecore XP1 prc package to deploy.

IdentityServerPackage.Description: The path to the Identity Server package to deploy.

XP1CollectionSitename.Description: The name of the XConnect Collection site to be deployed.

XP1CollectionSearchSitename.Description: The name of the XConnect Collection Search site to be deployed.

XP1MarketingAutomationSitename.Description: The name of the site to be deployed.

XP1MarketingAutomationReportingSitename.Description: The name of the XConnect Marketing Automation Reporting site to be deployed.

XP1ReferenceDataSitename.Description: The name of the XConnect Reference Data site to be deployed.

SitecoreXP1CDSitename.Description: The name of the Sitecore Content Delivery site to be deployed.

SitecoreXP1CMSitename.Description: The name of the Sitecore Content Management site to be deployed.

SitecoreXP1RepSitename.Description: The name of the Sitecore Reporting site to be deployed.

SitecoreXP1PrcSitename.Description: The name of the Sitecore Processing site to be deployed.

ProcessingService.Description: The url for the Processing Service.

ReportingService.Description: The url for the Reporting Service.

XConnectCollectionSearchService.Description: The url for the XConnect Collection Service.

PasswordRecoveryUrl.Description: Password recovery Url (Host name of CM instance).

SqlAdminUser.Description: The Sql admin user account to use when installing databases.

SqlAdminPassword.Description: The Sql admin password to use when installing databases.

SQLServer.Description: The Sql Server where databases will be installed.

SolrRoot.Description: The file path to the Solr instance.

SolrService.Description: The name of the Solr service.

XConnectCollectionService.Description: The URL of the XConnect Collection service.

XConnectReferenceDataService.Description: The URL of the XConnect Collection service.

MarketingAutomationOperationsService.Description: The URL of the Marketing Automation Operations service.

MarketingAutomationReportingService.Description: The URL of the Marketing Automation Operations service.

AllowedCorsOrigins.Description: Pipe-separated list of instances (URIs) that are allowed to login via Sitecore Identity.

ClientSecret.Description: Client secret of PasswordClient section. It's a random string between 1 and 100 symbols long.
